name: node-test-bed-adapter
description: An adapter to connect a node.js application to the Test-bed's Common Information Space or Common Simulation Space.

scripts.patch-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && pnpm publish
scripts.minor-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && pnpm publish
scripts.rc-dry-run: npm run clean && npm run build && pnpm publish --tag rc --publish-branch kafkajs --no-git-checks --dry-run
scripts.rc: npm run clean && npm run build && pnpm publish --tag rc --publish-branch kafkajs

author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com> (http://www.tno.nl)
